snippet: Michele Bachmann, whose campaign has run into difficulties, makes a last appeal to Iowa caucusgoers.
abstract: Republican presidential candidate Michele Bachmann makes dramatic final appeal to Iowa voters at church in Oskaloosa, weaving her personal story with Biblical parables about rebirth and redemption; has pinned the last hopes of her dwindling campaign on appealing to conservative Christian voters.
lead_paragraph: Michele Bachmann, whose campaign has run into difficulties, makes a last appeal to Iowa caucusgoers.

headline.seo: Michele Bachmann Makes as the Real Conservative
headline.main: Embattled but Confident, Bachmann Says She Is the ‘Complete Package’
headline.print_headline: Embattled but Confident, Bachmann Says She Is the ‘Complete Package’
